name: acapozzo-claude-marketplace
description: Local skills marketplace with individually installable plugins

plugins.name: implementation-plan
plugins.description: Generate structured implementation plans for Jira, PRs, and release docs

plugins.name: transcript-export
plugins.description: Export Claude Code session transcripts to searchable HTML files

plugins.name: typst-pdf-generator
